SELECT T.CODE_GRP_ID ,T.CODE_ID ,T.CODE_NM ,T.ATTR1 ,T.ATTR2 ,T.ATTR3 ,T.VIEW_ORD ,T.ACT_FLG ,T.FRST_OPER_ID ,T.FRST_OPER_DT ,T.LAST_OPER_ID ,T.LAST_OPER_DT FROM TB_CODE T
ORDER BY T.VIEW_ORD ASC, T.CODE_ID ASC, T.CODE_NM ASC

SELECT T.CODE_GRP_ID codeGrpId ,T.CODE_ID codeId ,T.CODE_NM codeNm ,T.ATTR1 attr1 ,T.ATTR2 attr2 ,T.ATTR3 attr3 ,T.VIEW_ORD viewOrd ,T.ACT_FLG actFlg ,T.FRST_OPER_ID frstOperId ,T.FRST_OPER_DT frstOperDt ,T.LAST_OPER_ID lastOperId ,T.LAST_OPER_DT lastOperDt FROM TB_CODE T WHERE T.CODE_GRP_ID = #{codeGrpId} AND T.CODE_ID = #{codeId}
